pages.text: Tiger are big felines that can be found in the Bamboo Jungles. They are naturally wary of outsiders and will attack if approached.$(br2)By feeding them chicken or porkchops, or other meats, one can obtain the Tiger's Blessing, and effect that will allow one to approach a Tiger without being mauled, but this effect only lasts a few minutes or if the Tiger is attacked.
They can be bred with Acacia Blossoms.
